name: TechCrunch
text:
Dozens of Al Jazeera journalists had their iPhones silently hacked by a "zero-click" exploit to deliver Pegasus, a spyware built by NSO Group. The spyware exploited a bug in iMessage, which Apple has now fixed.

https://t.co/U8c7ph2afX
